backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state, serving as a placeholder backend.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting six implemented features including landing page, shoe gallery, contact methods, logo display, and luxury theming with high confidence test coverage.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of seven frontend files describing the luxury shoe store's component structure, styling, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining luxury-focused design tokens for light and dark modes with neutral grayscale palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with basic meta tags, title 'luxury shop', and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component composing Hero, ShoeGallery, and ContactInfo into a single-page layout.
frontend/src/components/ContactInfo.tsx: Footer component displaying phone number 9079846195 with clickable phone and WhatsApp buttons, copyright notice, and caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section displaying luxury shop logo, brand name with sparkle icons, and tagline about premium footwear with gradient background.
frontend/src/components/ShoeGallery.tsx: Responsive grid gallery showcasing five shoe images (heels, dress shoes, sneakers, boots, loafers) with hover effects and luxury styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing ICP actor creation with identity-based authentication, query caching, and automatic invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication with login/logout functionality, status tracking, and AuthClient management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Intentionally empty file as the static showcase website has no backend methods or data fetching requirements.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom luxury-themed color palette (light/dark modes), OKLCH color space variables, and custom utility classes for luxury shadows and gold accents.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that sets up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme with custom colors (luxury-gold, sidebar, chart), font families (Inter, Playfair Display), border radius variables, and custom animations/keyframes.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining a static luxury shoe store website with contact-only functionality (phone/WhatsApp), image requirements for shoes and logo, and six existing features for landing page, gallery, contact display, and luxury theming.
